Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.domain

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.domain.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
Handles the generation of the level and most of the logic for the game. Should ONLY be handled directly by Domain and Persistency. TODO: export a lot of this to Domain. Maze != game logic. TODO: run spotbugs, do a bunch of immutability.
